Beatrice Akello Akori bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda (na afo 2021), na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Resistance Movement na-achị.
Beatrice Akello Akori bụ onye isi obodo nke Apac District
N'afọ 2020 ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Apac District taskforce maka COVID-19.
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwu maka mpaghara Agago
O nwetara vootu 31,450 iji merie nwanyị MP nke Agago, Judith Franca Akello (FDC), onye nwetara vootu 26,564.
